name: PC Parts BD
details: It also very difficult thinking How can i do or what can i do this full stack Website. It's very firsting and very difficult thingking what do i do! then i create one by by successfully my simple project. at first i create react app then i install Tailwind Css (CSS Framework). I rendomly select daisy UI (Tailwind CSS component library) then setup react-router, private-route, admin-route, and public-rout, nested-route under dashboard and firebase. There are some features (Under Dashboard Product management, user management, product upload etc) After client site complete then i create server site. There are mostly setup mongoDB, create API, dotEnv, JWT emplementation and others work. then i deploy both site (firebase and heroku).
